For example, @@ -44,1 +44,1 @@ - * There are SSLSessionContext parameters that affect how + * There are {@code SSLSessionContext} parameters that affect how @@ -53,1 +53,1 @@ - * in a SSLSessionContext can be listed. + * in a {@code SSLSessionContext} can be listed. @@ -64,1 +64,1 @@ - * Returns the SSLSession bound to the specified session id. + * Returns the {@code SSLSession} bound to the specified session id. @@ -67,1 +67,1 @@ - * @return the SSLSession or null if + * @return the {@code SSLSession} or null if @@ -70,1 +70,1 @@ - * @throws NullPointerException if sessionId is null. + * @throws NullPointerException if {@code sessionId} is null. @@ -76,1 +76,1 @@ - * SSLSessionContext. + * {@code SSLSessionContext}. @@ -85,2 +85,2 @@ - * Sets the timeout limit for SSLSession objects grouped - * under this SSLSessionContext. + * Sets the timeout limit for {@code SSLSession} objects grouped + * under this {@code SSLSessionContext}. @@ -91,2 +91,3 @@ - * SSLSession object is invalidated and future connections - * cannot resume or rejoin the session. + * {@code SSLSession} object is marked so that future connections + * cannot resume or rejoin the session. Active sessions can continue + * to be used so long as resume and rejoin operations are not attempted. @@ -94,1 +95,1 @@ - * the timeout limit is changed for this SSLSessionContext. + * the timeout limit is changed for this {@code SSLSessionContext}. @@ -112,2 +113,2 @@ - * Returns the timeout limit of SSLSession objects grouped - * under this SSLSessionContext. + * Returns the timeout limit of {@code SSLSession} objects grouped + * under this {@code SSLSessionContext}. @@ -118,2 +119,3 @@ - * SSLSession object is invalidated and future connections - * cannot resume or rejoin the session. + * {@code SSLSession} object is marked so that future connections + * cannot resume or rejoin the session. Active sessions can continue + * to be used so long as resume and rejoin operations are not attempted. @@ -122,1 +124,1 @@ - * SSLSessionContext. + * {@code SSLSessionContext}. @@ -136,2 +138,2 @@ - * Sets the size of the cache used for storing SSLSession - * objects grouped under this SSLSessionContext. + * Sets the size of the cache used for storing {@code SSLSession} + * objects grouped under this {@code SSLSessionContext}. @@ -155,2 +157,2 @@ - * Returns the size of the cache used for storing SSLSession - * objects grouped under this SSLSessionContext. + * Returns the size of the cache used for storing {@code SSLSession} + * objects grouped under this {@code SSLSessionContext}.
